summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2560, for the improvement of Montlake Boulevard, as established by Chapter 94, Session Laws of 1911, from the north line of the Government Canal right of way in Section 16, Township 25 North, Range 4 East W.M., to a point approximately 800 feet south of the south margin of East 45th Street, to connect with an unnamed street, established by Ordinance No. 26929.
